pages.text: (Koreha) arra no yakusokudearu. Arra wa sono yakusoku o tagae rarenai. Daga hitobito no oku wa rikai shinai
Kare-ra no shiru no wa, gense no seikatsu no hyomen dakedearu. Kare-ra wa (jibutsu no) ketsumatsu ni tsuite wa chui shinai

Kare-ra wa hansei shinai no ka. Arra ga ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o sozo nasa reta no wa, tada shinri no tame, mata sadame no toki no tamedearu koto o. Daga hitobito no oku wa,-nushi to no kaiken o hinin suru

Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa, chijo o tabi shite kare-ra izen no mono no saigo ga ikagadeatta ka o, kansatsu shinai no ka. Kare-ra (mukashi no hito) wa, kare-ra yori mo chikara ni oite sugure,-chi o horiokoshi (te kosaku shi), mata kare-ra yori mo haete ita. Soshite shito-tachi wa meisho o motte kare-ra no tokoro ni kita. Arra ga kare-ra o son tta node wanai. Kare-ra ga mizukara jibun o son tta nodearu
Shosen akugyo no to no saigo wa warui. Sore wa kare-ra ga arra no shirushi o kyogidearu to shi, sore o guro shite ita tamedearu
Arra wa mazu sozo o hajime, sorekara sore o kurikaeshi, sorekara anata gata o kare ni kisa reru
(Shinpan no) toki ga torai suru hi,-zai no aru mono wa zetsubo surudearou
Soshite kare-ra ga (ware ni) hai shita (kamigami no) nakaniha, kare-ra no tame ni torinasu mono mo naku, mata kare-ra mo, korera no hai shita mono-tachi o hinin suru
(Shinpan no) toki ga torai suru sonohi ni wa,(subete no hito wa) chiri djiri ni sa rerudearou
Sonotoki, zenko ni isoshinda mono wa, midori no nobe de, shiawaseni sa reyou
